name: Stardate
description:
A galactic dating app that gives you hints about your "only ONE"

Swipe right until you got the "only ONE" for you.

Made for gmtk's "only one" jam.

CONTROLS :

* Swipe left/right by pressing the left/right key.

* Look at the perfect profile for you by pressing the down key.

/!\ This is a prototype : the game may crash when you lose...
